item.title: Usefull hidden door
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Give him a tip that you can power both pistons with this diagram:

[] = piston

  • = normal block
  • = redstone wire

[]-
[]+

you stack the 2 pistons and lay a block behind the bottom piston and put redstone wire on top of that block, which can power both pistons with 1 wire

afaik it powers both pistons if you put the normal block and wire 1 block higher as well

Read full topic
